## Store.update() method

Updates store's state by using an [Updater](./ngx-tansu.updater.md) function. Equivalent of [Writable.update()](./ngx-tansu.writable.update.md)<!-- -->, but internal to the store.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected update(updater: Updater<T>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  updater | [Updater](./ngx-tansu.updater.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | a function that takes the current state as an argument and returns the new state. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
